Accessibility Auditor Pro

- Single-file HTML app with inline CSS and JS (no external dependencies).
- Main purpose: Scan and audit current webpage for key WCAG accessibility issues, displaying results with actionable fixes.
- **Core auditing features**:
  - Button triggers full page scan on load and "Audit Now" click.
  - Checks 8 testable issues: missing alt text on images, insufficient color contrast (WCAG AA ratios), keyboard focus visibility, missing form labels, heading hierarchy (h1-h6 order), ARIA role absence on interactive elements, link purpose clarity (descriptive text), and empty links.
  - Results show in a resizable panel: pass/fail count, detailed list with examples (e.g., "Image #3 lacks alt"), severity (high/medium/low), and one-click fix suggestions (e.g., "Add alt='description'").
- **Accessibility helpers** (app itself WCAG AA compliant):
  - Full keyboard navigation: Tab through all buttons/links, Enter/Space to activate, Escape to close panels.
  - High-contrast mode toggle (7:1 ratio), font resize (100-200% via rem units), screen reader optimized (ARIA live regions, landmarks, labels).
  - Simplified language: ARIA-describedby for all interactive elements, skip-to-content link.
- **Undo/Redo**: Ctrl+Z/Y for reverting audit result filters or manual note additions to issues.
- **Persistence**: Save audit results/screenshots to localStorage; reload on page refresh.
- **Print-friendly view**: Ctrl+P button generates print stylesheet (hides UI, shows results table only, black/white optimized).
- **Share via URL hash**: Encode top 3 issues + timestamp in #hash; load parses and re-displays matching audit.
- **UI Layout**: Fixed sidebar (audit button, toggles), main content area for results table (sortable columns: issue, count, fix), footer with stats (e.g., "92% accessible").
- **Implementation notes**: Use getComputedStyle for contrast calc, querySelectorAll for checks, Canvas for screenshot (toDataURL saved as base64 in storage).
- **Testable scenarios**: Load non-accessible page → audit shows errors → apply high-contrast → share URL → print matches PDF.
- Max ~800 LOC: Efficient JS (no frameworks), semantic HTML5, CSS Grid/Flexbox.
